scripts.react: concurrently "cd react/app && pnpm dev" "cd react/tile && pnpm dev" "cd emulator && pnpm dev"

scripts.vanilla: concurrently "cd vanilla/app && pnpm dev" "cd vanilla/tile && pnpm dev" "cd emulator && pnpm dev"
scripts.vue: concurrently "cd vue/app && pnpm dev" "cd vue/tile && pnpm dev" "cd emulator && pnpm dev"
